code: import React,{useState}from'react';import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[userInput,setUserInput]=useState('');const[apiResponse,setApiResponse]=useState('');const handleInput=event=>{setUserInput(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const apiURL='https://lamini-flan-t5-api.onrender.com/generate/';try{const response=await fetch(apiURL,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({prompt:userInput})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`bruhh what is this -> ${response.status}`);}const data=await response.json();console.log(data);setApiResponse(data[0]);}catch(error){alert(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form-container",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type something Intelligent...",value:userInput,onChange:handleInput,className:"input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Generate"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"response-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"response-box",value:apiResponse,readOnly:true,placeholder:"API Response will appear here..."})})]});}export default App;
